scripts.generate:slots:all: npm run generate:slots:gemotest && npm run generate:slots:invitro
scripts.test:gemotest: npm run allure:clean && npm run generate:patients && npm run generate:slots:gemotest && npx playwright test tests/gemotest
scripts.test:gemotest:ui: npm run allure:clean && npm run generate:patients && npm run generate:slots:gemotest && npx playwright test --headed tests/gemotest
scripts.test:all: npm run allure:clean && npm run generate:patients && npm run generate:slots:all && npx playwright test
scripts.test:all:ui: npm run allure:clean && npm run generate:patients && npm run generate:slots:all && npx playwright test --headed
